generic: move x y - moves to sector (x,y)
mine - mines object at current sector
help list - a list of help topics
map: Below, you will find a key for the map
'c' - An asteroid colony - trade or mine
'P' - A planet - Mine, land or build
'C' - A planetary colony - Trade, land or mine
The map is numbered from top to bottom and left to right
This means the top left sector is (0,0) and bottom right is (10,10)
